summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具 (Visual Designer) 中，為 控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

related.span: 如何：在設計模式中擴充控制項的外觀和行為

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string[] GetViewNames() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetViewNames () As String()
abstract member GetViewNames : unit -> string[] override this.GetViewNames : unit -> string[]

summary.span: 取得陣列名稱，表示資料來源中的具名檢視。

span.span: Gets an array of names representing named views in the data source.

returns.span: 這個實作一定會傳回空字串陣列。

span.span: This implementation always returns an empty string array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此資料來源設計工具中，不會實作具名的檢視。Named views are not implemented in this data source designer. 檢視會擷取根據 XPath 查詢，而不是名稱。Views are retrieved based on an XPath query rather than name.
